markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs=""
>
[Fire and Iceberg](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1311)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 46</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Fiery Anulite paprika, sunrise cinnamon, and winterbite are hidden inside this salad's translucent leaves, bringing the cool of snow and the heat of steam to every bite. The dueling sensations make some diners sweat and others shiver, but all leave with a lasting sense of heat and cold that make other sources pale in comparison. When you consume the salad, you gain resistance 5 to [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) and [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

Fire and Iceberg (greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 350 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain resistance 10 to fire and cold for 5 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain resistance 15 to fire and cold for 10 minutes.
